The literature describe multiple sedative agent Propofol , Etomidate , Midazolam , Fentanyl , etc . In emergency department ( ED ) Tel Aviv Medical Center ( TLVMC ) , sedation protocol contain Midazolam Ketamine main sedative analgesic agent . Sedation without risk . Known complication respiratory depression , aspiration , hemodynamic instability . These complication seem prevalent patient decrease cardio-respiratory reserve , elderly , morbid obese , obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) congestive heart failure ( CHF ) patient .
